description:
As the G-team had feared might come to pass, Katze`s show of chaos and destruction has begun. Spurred by Katze, many Crowds users launch an attack on Kasumigaseki and deals a devastating blow. The Prime Minister is forced to evacuate to an emergency relocation center in Tachikawa. With Rui under their protection and the Crowds going on a rampage, the G-team members discuss how to proceed...
Source: crunchyroll
